jawipe wijewirage aathmaya dolarwalata pawade, yuanpi eltitiee hora ma¼gul kapuwa amarikawada waki dakwina.me awasthawata ek wu samastha lanka pawidi sanwidhanaye pradhana lekam watinapaha somananda himiyo - amerikawa athulu batahira ratawal apa ratata erehiwa ki්rayathmaka kala me kumanthranayata erehiwa mulu mahath janathawama oonama awasthawaka ekamuthuwimata sudanam me wirodhatha udghoshanawalin pahadili wana bawa penwa dunha.jathika bhasha ha samaja eekabaddhatha amathi wasudewa nanayakkara mahatha adhirajyawadayata erehiwa me jana balawegaya wishala paniwidayak labadena bawata karunu dakwuyeya.widulibala ha balashakthi amathi patali champika ranawaka mahatha - pawathi bhayanaka yuddhaye jayagrahanaya noiwasana amerikawa athulu batahira jathin diyath karana me kumanthranaya parajaya kirimata awashya katayuthu karana bawa pawasiya.jathika jalasampadana amathi dinesh gunawardhana mahatha - ada pamini me maha jana balawegaya thulin widesha athapewimaka di eyata erehi wana rate janathawage ekamuthu bawa lowata kadima lesa pennum karana bawa pawasiya.basnahira palath aandukara alawi mawulana mahatha - wadakarana janathawa kawadath widesha kumanthranawalin rata raka ganimata kriyakarana bawa awadharanaya keleya.kamkaru ha kamkaru sabandatha amathi gamini lokuge mahatha - darusman wartha ha chanal fo siduwim genaemin shri lankawe yuda jayagrahanaya hallu kirimata kriyakala adhirajyawadin mewara jiniwa manawa himikam kawunsalayata api yuda aparadha kala bawata asathya prakasha idiripath kalath eewa parajaya kirime mul piyawara ada me sthanayen sanituhan kara athayi pawasiya.widesha rakiya prawardhana amathi dilan perera mahatha – eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya amerika eksath janapadaye budalayak nowana bawata karunu dakwuyeya.injineru ha idikirim, niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathi wimal wirawansha mahatha - widesha ratawal akamathi samayak apa labagath nisa owun apata erehiwa kumanthranaya karana bawa penwa dunneya.jyeshta amathi ee. ech. am. fawusi mahatha - api diwihimiyen labagath nidahasa diwihimiyen ma rakagatha yuthu yayi kiweyaadhyapana katayuthu pilibanda amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha - prajathanthrawadiwa katayuthu karana ratakata anisi lesa athapowa yalith le wagirim athi kirimata adhirajyawadin mana balana bawata karunu penwa dunneya.mahajana sambandhatha ha mahajana upayogitha amathi marwin silwa mahatha - me wijathika kumanthranawalata erehiwa shri lankika janathawa diwihimiyen katayuthu kirimata sudanam bawa pawasiya.parlimenthu manthri ee. ech. em. aswar mahatha - uthure sita dakuna dakwa samastha shri lankika janathawa kisidu bhedayakin thorawa labu yuda jaya pawa nodimata ek wi athayi pawasiya.swayanrakiya niyukthikayange sammelanaye sabhapathi ha kolambaa nagarika manthri mahinda kahandagama mahatha yuddhayen wadiyenma pida winend me ahinsaka podu janathawa.
